featured.text: In the sixteenth century, when the Africans were taken from their homes to Brazil against their will and kept in slavery, Capoeira began to take form among the community of slaves for self-defense.
And maybe the third important thing is my father’s admonition that offense is the best defense.

definition.en_def: The action of defending from or resisting an attack.
definition.example: The team's defense was strong enough to prevent the opposing players from scoring.
